Pre-Game Insights: India and New Zealand have both won all four of their games in the World Cup
India may make changes following the unavailability of Hardik
Williamson's absence would be felt by the Kiwis
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played in Dharamshala, a picturesque venue with the Himalayas as a backdrop
Others: The forecast for rains is a concern for the match
